content: OCBC Securities iOCBC DBS Vickers Securities Investments Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 May 2018Can one open an OCBC securities and DBS Vickers, linking to the same CDP account?5 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (5)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Prakash KumaraswamiLevel 2. RookieUpdated on 07 Jun 2019I had checked this in the past to include second account to CDP, unfortunately its not allowed - only one account at a time. Dividends paid by holding equities would be debited to the linked account.1 comment1
Billy Ko07 Jun 2019Hi Prakash, you might wanna relook this as its possible to link 2 brokerage accounts to one CDP account.

Gabriel ThamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 08 May 2018Yes, you can do that. You can have as many brokerage accounts linking to the same CDP account. â€‹However, do take note that Direct Crediting Service (DCS) for crediting of dividends can only be linked to one bank account.0 comments1

Billy Ko, President - Investment Club at Singapore Institute Of TechnologyLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Jun 2019Yes you're able to link many brokerage accounts to one CDP account. No issues on that.0 comments0
Jeff Yeo,   amateur Social contributor  at School of social sharingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Jun 2019You can have multiple platforms linked to CDP0 comments0
